raw_body: FERNANDO – DAKSHINI (SHINI) MIRANEE (nee SAMARAWEERA). Called home to Jesus. Dearly loved wife of the late Hilary D. Fernando, daughter of the late Selwyn and Muriel Samaraweera, sister of the late Sirancee and late Dr. Noel Gunawardana and of Rukmini and the late Neville Mendis, loved and cared for by cousins and many nephews and nieces.
